snippet.title: History of Ertos - Summoners Glory: Eternal Fire
snippet.description:
Google Play Store: https://bit.ly/SG-Android
App Store: https://bit.ly/SG-ios
-----------------------------------------------------------
Summoners Glory is an epic classic turn-based card collection MMORPG.

Join us in an epic battle against the Demon Lord Morganter! For a long time, darkness dwelled over Kairasia and the people of Ertos suffered immensely. But Heavens heard the people cry and now, together with Gods on their side humans are marching into the final battle.

We need your help Hero, join us! This battle will decide the fate of the world!
-----------------------------------------------------------
UNFORGETTABLE STORY & IMMERSIVE 3D WORLD

Experience the unique story in the land of Kairasia with hundreds of original cutscenes.
Discover the impressive MMO world with awesome 3D graphics.

SUMMON & EVOLVE HEROES

* Summon powerful heroes called phantoms to fight by your side.
* Collect more than 200 phantoms, each with their own unique skills, and skins.
* Assemble a perfect formation for strategic battles.
* Level, evolve and upgrade your phantoms to become a great phantom master.

CLASSIC RPG WITH EPIC PVE & PVP CONTENT

* Choose from 18 types of weapons, all with unique skills to use in combat.
* Well designed PVE dungeons require good squad co-operation.
* Squad up with your friends and guildmates to defeat epic bosses and win awesome rewards!
* Cross-server match-up. Compete against real players worldwide in strategic turn-based battles. (coming soon)

DIVERSE SOCIAL SYSTEMS

* Chat with players from all over the world.
* Become a student to train with your master, then become a master to teach your students.
* Discover more relationships with friends and marriage systems.
